Platform / Profile Settings

Profile Settings

To open the profile settings menu click on the user icon in the top right corner of the screen.

With the profile settings menu open you have access to the following menus:

  • Click on Users to open the user menu and add additional users to your organization.

  • Click on Subscription to open the subscription menu. In the subscription menu you can change your subscription from community to Plus or Professional or to start a trial.

  • Click on Settings to open the settings menu. In the settings menu you can change your billing information and add a logo for your organization that will be displayed with your models.

  • By clicking on Logout you get logged out of your Archilogic account.

Based on the documentation template by Bootstrap team, generated with a fork of Jekyll Bootstrap Doc.
